item.description:
Please join us for climbing at MetroRock because it's always more fun to climb with others. We'll start in the bouldering area then do some top rope climbing. Afterwards, we'll go for some ice cream.

Rates: A <7yo day pass is $10

A Student day or Bouldering only pass is $15

Shoe rental is $5

Top rope harness is $3

See MetroRock site for more information.

I'll send out my number Saturday night. If you have any questions please post or message me.

See you then... Douglas
item.how_to_find_us: Look for us by the picnic tables or in the bouldering area.
item.name: Climbing with Kids
